org.openjdk.tools.javac.file

类 PathFileObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openjdk.tools.javac.file.PathFileObject
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    FileObject, JavaFileObject

    public abstract class PathFileObject
extends Object
implements JavaFileObject
    Implementation of JavaFileObject using java.nio.file API.

    PathFileObjects are, for the most part, straightforward wrappers around immutable absolute Path objects. Different subtypes are used to provide specialized implementations of "inferBinaryName" and "getName" that capture additional information available at the time the object is created.

    In general, JavaFileManager#isSameFile should be used to determine whether two file objects refer to the same file on disk. PathFileObject also supports the standard equals and hashCode methods, primarily for convenience when working with collections. All of these operations delegate to the equivalent operations on the underlying Path object.

    This is NOT part of any supported API. If you write code that depends on this, you do so at your own risk. This code and its internal interfaces are subject to change or deletion without notice.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • PathFileObject

        protected PathFileObject(BaseFileManager fileManager,
                         Path path)
        Create a PathFileObject, for a specified path, in the context of a given file manager. In general, this path should be an absolute path, if not a Path.toRealPath(java.nio.file.LinkOption...) real path. It will be used as the basis of equals, hashCode and isSameFile methods on this file object. A PathFileObject should also have a "friendly name" per the specification for FileObject.getName(). The friendly name is provided by the various subtypes of PathFileObject.
        参数:
        fileManager - the file manager creating this file object
        path - the path contained in this file object.

    • 方法详细资料

      • forJarPath

        public static PathFileObject forJarPath(BaseFileManager fileManager,
                                        Path path,
                                        Path userJarPath)
        Create a PathFileObject for a file in a file system such as a jar file, such that the binary name can be inferred from its position within the file system. The binary name is derived from path. The name is derived from the composition of userJarPath and path.
        参数:
        fileManager - the file manager creating this file object
        path - the path referred to by this file object
        userJarPath - the path of the jar file containing the file system.
        返回:
        the file object

      • forJRTPath

        public static PathFileObject forJRTPath(BaseFileManager fileManager,
                                        Path path)
        Create a PathFileObject for a file in a modular file system, such as jrt:, such that the binary name can be inferred from its position within the filesystem. The binary name is derived from path, ignoring the first two elements of the name (which are "modules" and a module name). The name is derived from path.
        参数:
        fileManager - the file manager creating this file object
        path - the path referred to by this file object
        返回:
        the file object

      • getSimpleName

        public static String getSimpleName(FileObject fo)
        Return the last component of a presumed hierarchical URI. From the scheme specific part of the URI, it returns the substring after the last "/" if any, or everything if no "/" is found.
        参数:
        fo - the file object
        返回:
        the simple name of the file object
